alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene; Hamblen; Hawkins (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 3:48PM CDT until July 29 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hawkins County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Cocke County in east Tennessee... Western Greene County in east Tennessee... Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 448 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Russellville, or near Morristown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morristown, Greeneville, Russellville, Mosheim, Bulls Gap, Baileyton, Caney Branch, St. Clair, Lowland and Romeo. This includes Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 10 and 37. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
